00080         for(int i=0; i<s.getListSize(); ++i)
00081         {
00082             cout<<"#"<<(i+1)<<" "<<s.getScore(i)<<" : ";
00083             for(int j=0; j<s.getCount(i); ++j)
00084             {
00085                 cout<< s.getLexicon(i, j) << "/" << s.getStrPOS(i, j) << "@" << s.getBaseForm(i, j) << " ";
00086             }
00087             cout<<endl;
00088         }
00089         cout<<endl;
